original_text: Do your work for six days each week, but do not work on the seventh day. Then your oxen and your donkeys will have time to rest. Any slave who was born in your home and any foreigner who works for you may also have time to rest. That will help them to be strong.
korean_text: 너는 엿새 동안에 네 일을 하고 일곱째 날에는 쉬라 네 소와 나귀가 쉴 것이며 네 여종의 자식과 나그네가 숨을 돌리리라

sentences.original_text: Do your work for six days each week
sentences.korean_translation: 매주 엿새 동안 네 일을 하고

sentences.original_text: but do not work on the seventh day
Then your oxen and your donkeys
Any slave who was born in your home
and any foreigner who works for you
may also have time to rest
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 쉴 시간을 가질 수 있다

sentences.original_text: That will help them to be strong
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 그들이 튼튼해지는 데 도움이 될 것이다
